response.overview: Studio 2000 is thrilled to welcome acclaimed industry giant Mike Donner into our stable of master directors—with our latest staggeringly brilliant sure-to-be-smash In the Jeans! In the Jeans asks a deliciously provocative question: What is it about a beautiful chiseled stud in a pair of tight blue jeans that drives us as gay men into such cock-pumping lust? Maybe it's the way they hug an exquisite cock, thighs, balls, and ass so tight we can just about taste the pre-cum! Donner gives us a blazing look at all the forms this unstoppable denim-on-flesh lust takes—a cum-blasting look full of fucking, sucking, and ass-licking!
response.title: In the Jeans
